extraction.title: Preferences.java line 36
extraction.description: There's a lot more information about this crash on crashlytics.com: https://fabric.io/owntracks/android/apps/org.owntracks.android/issues/55087fd25141dcfd8f26a258
extraction.comments: Expected and fixed by clearing preferences. Importing an old config could result in #125 though. Added fallback code to prevent crashes
